page.title: 02DUNSTABLE OPEN AIR MARKET
page.content: A general market is held in Dunstable on Wednesdays & Saturdays; a small market consisting of food & antiques is held on Fridays.On any one market there is available a maximum number of eighty eight by four foot metal units each of which may be constructed to form a market stall for which a stall holder pays '9.10 per market day; there are also thirty pitches for which a retailer pays '6.00 per eight foot pitch excluding any equipment. Some goods sold in the market are meat,groceries,bric_a_brac,ornaments, animal foods,clothes and also lots of confectionary.Shoppers travel from distances of approximately 30 miles to attend the market.One retailer this year celebrates her 40th year as a store holder.
